articles.title: Cellular Mechanics-Based Tool May Help Diagnose Cancerous Cells - Genetic Engineering & Biotechnology News
articles.description: Checking cell conditions by measuring force distribution may dramatically improve diagnostic accuracy.
articles.content: A team lead by researchers from the National Institute for Materials Science (NIMS) in Tsukuba, Japan, used atomic force microscopy to apply force across the surface of various cells. The method uses… [+3289 chars]
